column4: displayName
Metadata About Data Sources
description
Indicates if this Dataset is derived from another dataset, such as a climate model
The name or title of the dataset from which this Dataset is derived
The author of the source dataset
The institution or organization at which the source dataset was created, e.g. NASA
The version number of the source data
The unique identifier or web URL to the source dataset
The date on which the source dataset was last modified, as used in the derivation of this Dataset
The date when this Dataset's depositor obtained the source dataset
A broad categorization of the source data by method of data creation
A broad categorization of the source data by method of data creation
The spatial resolution of the raster data
The horizontal grid spacing of the source data as a number with no unit
The unit of the Spatial Resolution

column3: Other Source Dataset Spatial Resolution Unit
column4: The unit of the Spatial Resolution
The temporal frequency of data in the source dataset
The temporal frequency of data in the source dataset
Bibliographic references to the source data, which are typically included in the terms of use
Disclaimer text provided by the source dataset creators
identifier

column3: Observational data (incl. wx stations and AQ monitors)
